statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.headline: Colorado State 76, Southern Colorado 67
article.story: FORT COLLINS, Colo. (AP) -- Tyler Smith scored 18 of his 26 points in the second half as Colorado State survived a scare from Division II Colorado State-Pueblo and won 76-67 Friday night. The junior college transfer from Northeastern Junior College was 8-for-19 shooting with two 3-pointers, one that gave Colorado State (1-0) its first lead in the second half. Jason Smith added 19 points and seven rebounds in the season opener for the Rams. Major Willette led Colorado State-Pueblo with 22 points. The game was an exhibition game for the Thunderwolves of the Rocky Mountain Athletic Conference. Tyler Smith's 3-pointer put Colorado State up 43-42 with 12:01 left in the second half, but Willette's outside shooting kept the Thunderwolves close. Willette's basket on a goaltending call with 3:43 remaining made it 60-47. Jason Smith and Tyler Smith scored four points each in a mini 8-0 run that put Colorado State ahead 68-57. Colorado State-Pueblo never got closer than seven points over the final 2:06. Colorado State-Pueblo took a 33-28 lead into halftime as Willette scored five points of his 13 first-half points in the last 3:17 of the half. Colorado State-Pueblo finished 9-for-20 on 3-pointers, but turned the ball over 25 times.
